newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka stocks flat, retailers lead the way.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka stocks flat, retailers lead the way.

text.p: Sri Lanka stocks were steady in early Friday trading, as many investors were still away following the holidays on Wednesday and Thursday, brokers said.
The all share index was 0.56 points higher at 728.56 at midday, on turnover of 8.7 million rupees.
"Retailers are calling the shots, with many of the large investors on holiday," said a trader at brokerage John Keells.
Another trader said: "We have had some enquiries to buy selected blue chips, but do not expect the trades to take place today."
